nodes.text: Arden was a male Human captain of the Republic Strategic Information Service living during the Galactic War. Around 3642 BBY he contacted Captain Elson on Hoth and informed him and a Republic citizen that an Imperial transport, which held two SIS agents captive, was recently shot down and that an escape pod was launched out. Arden and Elson believed that the agents hid vital information in the pod, so they send the citizen to find and retrieve it.
Captain Arden appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a hologram during the mission "Freeze Out The Empire" on Hoth.
